column1: It was great meeting with El Paso veterans and residents today to discuss my work and accomplishments from my first year in office.  Thank you to all of those who came I’m looking forward to the new year of serving our beautiful city! ☀️ https://t.co/WpcOZLPUCo

Good morning El Paso! ☀️  Today I’m hosting my veterans town hall meeting at 10 am and my general town hall meeting at 1 pm. I’ll discuss my work during my first year in office on behalf of El Pasoans. See you there!  https://t.co/omvW3rxidO] https://t.co/9bxgcQokoe
Feliz cumpleaños amiga! Sending you a big birthday hug @RepDMP hoping you have a wonderful day with your family.  🎂❤️ https://t.co/WzR4fQMYsC

TOMORROW: I’m hosting my veterans town hall meeting and my monthly town hall meeting at 10 am and 1 pm. I’ll discuss my work during my first year in office on behalf of El Paso residents.   Don’t forget to RSVP👇🏽 https://t.co/omvW3rxidO] https://t.co/vDZi8MMjGe
My courageous wonderful beautiful friend @RepPressley  thank you for sharing your story.  You are a #Shero https://t.co/R82F3j6Djh

Today I’m proud to introduce with @NydiaVelazquez H.R. 5625 the Targeting Environmental and Climate Recklessness Act to deter and hold accountable foreign individuals and companies who engage in reckless behaviors that exacerbate the climate crisis.   https://t.co/L29f1of3mQ

Climate change is an urgent global crisis that demands a strong and swift response. As Congress continues to push for ambitious climate action we must also ensure we harness foreign policy to combat this threat and protect our planet for future generations.

And the @DHSgov Migrant Protection Protocols (aka Return to Mexico) policy is a program you run that sends vulnerable asylum seekers into the clutches of these depraved people you mention.  I’m asking you to use your voice and authority to help them @DHS_Wolf by ending MPP. https://t.co/fH3V88O5fA

We have to ensure our @DeptofDefense can engage and compete with China and investing in American STEM programs is a key part of that.  I'm proud that @UTEP has a high number of clearance-ready STEM graduates who stand ready to serve our country & address our security challenges. https://t.co/YYk6rttdnp

EL PASO: This Saturday I'll be hosting my veterans town hall meeting and my monthly town hall meeting at 10 am and 1 pm. I’ll discuss my work during my first year in Congress and answer your questions.   Click below to RSVP👇🏽  https://t.co/omvW3rxidO https://t.co/3oRn3yACgr

Africa is a key area of geopolitical competition with Russia & China. Our bipartisan National Security Strategy demands we focus on this.  That’s why my colleagues and I wrote a letter to @DeptofDefense to share concerns with a proposal to reduce our troop presence in the region. https://t.co/yon20OeuY3

.@SpeakerPelosi has selected a talented & diverse group of leaders as managers. I’m grateful for their leadership in weeks ahead.  So proud to serve with all of them but I’m feeling especially proud that my dear friend the tough and brilliant @RepSylviaGarcia is a manager. https://t.co/1KY9QdaeLx

Today my @HouseJudiciary colleagues and I launched an investigation into the dangerous “Remain in Mexico” policy.  It’s time to hold the administration accountable for this deeply un-American practice that blocks due process for asylum seekers.   https://t.co/F3avRMlsnM

It’s that time of year again: flu season.  It’s not too late to get a flu vaccine to help protect yourself and your loved ones. @EPTXFire and @ElPasoTXGov Public Health are offering vaccines at no cost for eligible children and adults. Learn more 👇🏽  https://t.co/OyDFOiiGND

And it snows in 55 degree weather too right?  This is a lie.  The only thing protecting Americans’ healthcare with pre-existing conditions has been the tenacity of @HouseDemocrats who are fighting tooth and nail #ForThePeople and against your efforts to obliterate the ACA https://t.co/sWFgGKnHit

In less than a year six children died in Border Patrol custody. The circumstances of these senseless and tragic deaths have been exacerbated by the lack of transparency and accountability within @DHSgov. We deserve answers.  https://t.co/mmBKGcPjd9
Have questions? Attend my January town hall meeting this Saturday at 1 PM to talk with El Paso Census Office representatives about job opportunities. RSVP now 👇🏽  https://t.co/jWb7SjinkD

The @uscensusbureau seeks to fill temporary positions in El Paso to assist with the 2020 Census.   You can make a difference help your community and earn extra income for doing it. Apply online now at https://t.co/CvdZykCDF8! https://t.co/5SMeSTn6MB

A closer look at the data tells the real story of our economy.   It’s an economy that works very well for the top earners but fails the millions of Americans who have jobs and  can barely make a living. https://t.co/hg5figcuB5

The third country agreements “increase the power of DHS and make people jump through impossible hoops. If this goes into effect across the entire border no one will be able to ask for asylum anymore."  That’s precisely the goal of this administration. https://t.co/dl7AtP2MIR

EL PASO: I'll be hosting my veteran’s town hall meeting and my monthly town hall meeting on Saturday Jan. 18 at 10 am and 1 pm.  I’ll discuss my work during my first year in Congress on the behalf of El Paso. RSVP below👇🏽  https://t.co/omvW3rfGPe https://t.co/uiw656pfMm

.@GovAbbott’s decision to not accept any more refugees for initial resettlement in Texas is deeply un-American and wrong.   Immigration is not a zero-sum game. We are a nation of immigrants and refugees make our state economy and communities like El Paso stronger. https://t.co/ec0KY2KkjU

EL PASO: Join me at my veterans town hall meeting and my monthly town hall meeting on Saturday Jan. 18 at 10 am and 1 pm.  I’ll discuss my work during my first year in Congress and answer your questions. RSVP below👇🏽  https://t.co/omvW3rxidO https://t.co/MlISDroVb5

War with Iran is not an outcome the American people want and under the Constitution @POTUS does not have the authority to unilaterally wage war.  Today in an effort to keep our troops and America safe I was proud to vote for a War Powers Resolution.  https://t.co/XTqAS8eq2F

As a Member of Congress my duty is to protect El Pasoans and defend our nation’s interests.   Unfortunately the reckless and irresponsible actions by @realDonaldTrump have endangered our servicemembers diplomats and allies and worked counter to American security interests.

.@realDonaldTrump’s reckless and irresponsible actions toward Iran are even more dangerous because he has no clear strategy.  That is why I’m proud to support a War Powers Resolution directing the President to end hostilities with Iran to keep our troops and America safe. https://t.co/N5LBWAR8Eu

This NFL season El Pasoans have someone to root for: @Showtyme_33.  The Jones brothers fellow @UTEP Miners and Burges Mustangs are true role models for our community and their humility and generosity is an inspiration to so many El Pasoans.  https://t.co/SCazhMiEfT

.@senatemajldr is out of excuses.  Every single argument he has made against holding a fair trial including subpoenaing documents and hearing from witnesses has fallen apart. The Constitution demands that the Senate hold a fair trial.   https://t.co/m4pcB4Iist

One year ago @HouseDemocrats introduced #HR8 bipartisan-passed legislation to help #EndGunViolence.  Yet @senatemajldr continues to fail the victims survivors and thousands of communities like El Paso impacted by gun violence by blocking a vote on this crucial step forward. https://t.co/TNuRAmT8qi

Targeting El Paso was painful to watch.   Despite the Trump administration’s cruel immigration policies and the deadly attack against our community El Pasoans will continue to set an example for the nation and our resilience will guide the way.   We are #ElPasoStrong. https://t.co/h9S6LNpNOV

For the @realDonaldTrump administration there is no bottom.  @DHSgov will now deport asylum seekers to a country that might not even be their own – undermining our asylum system and putting individuals seeking refuge in danger. This cruelty must end.  https://t.co/ToQLfjOHPx

I was in Iraq last spring speaking with allies committed to working alongside us in the fight against ISIS. One of my brothers who was there furthering American interests left Iraq just a few months ago.  I'm praying for our troops diplomats personnel & allies in the region. https://t.co/u9MZaCe6OS

Keeping our fellow Americans in Puerto Rico in my prayers after the devastating earthquakes on the island.   I join @NydiaVelazquez’s call for @POTUS to issue an emergency declaration immediately so federal assistance can reach those in need.   https://t.co/kQXbWitAwa

For almost 30 years El Pasoans tuned in to watch @estelacasasep – a compassionate and trusted Paseña – deliver the news.  Today we celebrate her and look forward to seeing her work as ED of @umcf_ep and @epchfoundation.   https://t.co/VcTxsHYKLM
To my Republican colleagues (Part II):  Do you think this is okay too? https://t.co/yCS3NQYkoe
To my Republican colleagues:  Do you think this is okay? https://t.co/IF4xlHtOQa
This is our new reality.    And it will continue to get worse unless we act urgently and aggressively to address the #ClimateEmergency https://t.co/OR4gp7HQqT

This is the #ClimateEmergency. Don’t look away pretend it doesn’t impact us or that this is normal.  We each have to change our behavior and consumption.  And we must demand our government take immediate urgent aggressive action.  @HouseDemocrats have but we can’t do it alone. https://t.co/Xk7ZaSzAhy

2019 was a challenging and painful year for El Paso but as always we showed that we are #ElPasoStrong.  I’m proud to represent El Pasoans and honored to join our brave first responders and @thegreatkhalid as an @ElPasoTimes 2019 Newsmaker.   https://t.co/CG2d20IoER

This is terrible news. Last spring I had the privilege to travel to Baghdad w/ ⁦@HASCDemocrats⁩ and learned first hand how important and mutually beneficial our presence in Iraq has been. They are key partners in our fight against terrorism and ISIS. https://t.co/kF9lWKoCo5

The escalation with Iran endangers American troops diplomats and allies. Qasem Soleimani was an enemy of the U.S.  Who provided this guidance & what was the intelligence that led to it?  Why wasn’t Congress consulted?  What is the strategy going forward? https://t.co/4d6oR6TxqM

We’re all relieved it wasn’t worse.  And we don’t yet know how the killer got his gun or what legislation might’ve prevented this altogether (e.g. background check).  But we DO know that as gun laws have been loosened in Texas the bloodshed and violence increased not decreased.

Remember when churches didn’t need armed security?   When kids could go to school w/o fear of being shot?  When going to Walmart didn’t inspire terror?  I saw the video and it was indeed horrendous and greusome and terrifying.  Deadly shootouts in church should be a wake up call. https://t.co/V7OO50luXk

He is a warrior like no other.  Sending you much love and all my prayers @repjohnlewis https://t.co/ccPzh2SRyN

As a representative of one of the largest manufacturing regions in North America a vote for USMCA is a vote for the more than 23000 El Pasoans dependent on a prosperous border economy.  Read my full statement below 👇🏼  https://t.co/hGZXL7rc5T

Esta mañana mis compañeras de lucha @RepSylviaGarcia @RepDMP y yo conversamos con @TelemundoNews sobre la enorme responsabilidad y honor que tenemos al ser parte de @HouseJudiciary y defender nuestra constitución.   No se pierdan este reportaje. https://t.co/wSHaOqkkYc

I do not take my oath of office lightly.   That is why with El Pasoans and our fragile democracy in my heart and mind I stood with my fellow patriots to uphold my oath and defend the Constitution.  Read my full statement below:   https://t.co/UliQFSVbIA

The most powerful evidence of this pattern has come from @realDonaldTrump himself.   We must uphold our oath of office and defend the Constitution and our fragile democracy because no one is above the law.  #DefendOurDemocracy  https://t.co/l0Vbjvrt9M

Today I stand ready to protect our sacred Republic support these articles of impeachment and pray that my colleagues have the courage to do the same.  We must uphold our oath of office and defend the Constitution and our fragile democracy because no one is above the law.

The @HouseJudiciary then reviewed the evidence and concluded that two articles of impeachment were warranted.  The evidence shows that @realDonaldTrump is a clear and present danger to our free and fair elections and national security.

The @HouseIntel conducted a robust investigation into @realDonaldTrump’s misconduct.  All this despite the fact that under his direction 12 current and former Administration officials refused to testify – even ignoring subpoenas – and 71 document requests were denied.
The evidence is overwhelming and clearly shows that @realDonaldTrump will continue to abuse his office and obstruct Congress if left unchecked.

Our country faces a great tragedy and moment of truth.   We have witnessed the President abuse his public office for personal political gain and invite foreign governments to interfere in our elections putting the integrity of a government of for and by the people at risk.

No legislation is perfect and despite the fact that this legislation includes many priorities that I have advocated for on behalf of El Paso it provides funding for abhorrent practices.  I can’t support legislation that legitimizes #MPP and gives @realDonaldTrump a blank check. https://t.co/yLLMqxpuO8

As leaders we should be protecting our republic - a democracy that is more fragile than we understood. I pray tonight that all of our colleagues have the courage to do the right thing: defend our beloved America and uphold their oath of office.
One man: @realDonaldTrump.  Donald Trump isn’t for America. Donald Trump is for Donald Trump.

We should be unified in confronting what the framers warned us about what our founding fathers feared and to stand up for what brave patriots fought and died for.  Instead we’ve seen blanket denials of facts and the selling out of America’s soul intended to protect one man.

But what is even worse than a President who violates his oath is the tragedy of his enablers who choose to look the other way turn a blind eye explain it away and tell us to ignore what we’ve seen and heard with our own eyes and ears.

Today we face one of those great tragedies and it is a moment of truth for us.  We have witnessed the President of the United States betraying his oath of office inviting foreign countries to interfere in our elections and covering up his wrongdoing.

In moments of great tragedy Americans have always found a way to come together. Not republicans not democrats but Americans.  And those of us fortunate enough to be elected leaders have a unique obligation to ensure America triumphs over her challenges.

This vote honors my responsibilities to our troops promotes a diverse and inclusive military supports additive manufacturing in our region addresses climate change and doesn’t authorize backfill of military funds robbed for @realDonaldTrump’s ineffective border wall.
